form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To prohibit the Environmental Protection Agency from using assessments generated by the Integrated Risk Information System as a tier 1 data source in rulemakings and other regulatory, enforcement, or permitting actions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No IRIS Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on use of assessments generated by the Integrated Risk Information System program
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency may not use any assessment generated by the Integrated Risk Information System program of the Environmental Protection Agency as a basisâ€”

paragraph.text: to develop, finalize, or issue a rule or regulation;
to carry out any other regulatory, enforcement, or permitting action; or
to inform air toxics assessments or other mapping or screening tools.
